tool_description: Analyzes protocol amendments to determine regulatory impact, required notifications, and approval processes across jurisdictions.

original_protocol_path.description: Path to the current approved protocol version

amended_protocol_path.description: Path to the proposed amended protocol version

active_jurisdictions.description: List of jurisdictions where the protocol is approved

error_messages: Protocol file not found: One or both protocol file paths are invalid or inaccessible
Invalid jurisdiction: One or more specified jurisdictions are not recognized
Invalid amendment type: Use substantial, non_substantial, or administrative
Invalid urgency level: Use urgent_safety, standard, or administrative
Protocol comparison error: Unable to compare protocol versions due to format issues
usage: Provide original and amended protocol paths with active jurisdictions to assess regulatory impact and determine required approval processes.

impact_assessment.description: Overall regulatory impact assessment of the amendment

key_changes.description: Summary of significant protocol changes identified
